message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
You rejected 50/50, so I'll try to take the majority
I'll try to take the majority too! You can't outbid me!
You think you can outbid me? Let's see about that!
You're getting desperate, Bob! I'll take the lead!
You think you're taking the lead? I'll show you what desperation looks like!
You're getting desperate, Bob! I'll take the lead and crush your hopes!
You think you're crushing me? I'll show you what a real negotiation looks like!
You're running out of options, Bob! I'll take the majority and finish this!
You think you're going to finish this? I'll make you regret it!
You're getting desperate, Bob! I'll take the majority and finish this once and for all!
Fine, I'll take what's left. You win this time, but I'll be back!
